name: R5-StructureMapTargetListMode-R4-StructureMapTargetListMode
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 StructureMapTargetListMode into FHIR R4

element.display: when the target list is being assembled, the items for this rule go first. If more than one rule defines a first item (for a given instance of mapping) then this is an error.

target.display: when the target list is being assembled, the items for this rule go first. If more than one rule defines a first item (for a given instance of mapping) then this is an error.

element.display: when the target list is being assembled, the items for this rule go last. If more than one rule defines a last item (for a given instance of mapping) then this is an error.

target.display: when the target list is being assembled, the items for this rule go last. If more than one rule defines a last item (for a given instance of mapping) then this is an error.

element.display: the target instance is shared with the target instances generated by another rule (up to the first common n items, then create new ones).

target.display: the target instance is shared with the target instances generated by another rule (up to the first common n items, then create new ones).

element.display: the target instance is shared with a number of target instances generated by another rule (up to the first common n items, then create new ones).

target.display: re-use the first item in the list, and keep adding content to it.
